2072.subject: HPWE
2072.descrlong: Introduces alternative approaches to well-being and healing that compares and contrasts theory, application, and methods of Holistic Healing - what they are, how and why they are reputed to work.  With an in-depth look, compares  conventional mainstream healthcare, and non-conventional treatments and health practices, including views of Western and Eastern perspectives. (Offered as interest warrants.)
